targets.query:
SELECT last(uptime)
FROM system
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/

SELECT last(n_cpus)
FROM system
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/

SELECT mean(usage_iowait)
FROM cpu 
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation), host
fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_system)
FROM cpu 
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation), host
fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user)
FROM cpu 
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation), host
fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_idle)
FROM cpu 
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation), host
fill(null)

SELECT mean(used)
FROM mem
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($interval)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(cached)
FROM mem
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($interval)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(buffered)
FROM mem
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($interval)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(free)
FROM mem
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($interval)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(total)
FROM mem
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($interval)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(used)
FROM disk
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ 
GROUP BY time($aggregation), path
fill(null)

SELECT mean(total)
FROM disk
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ 
GROUP BY time($aggregation), path
fill(null)

SELECT mean(used)
FROM swap
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(total)
FROM swap
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(blocked)
FROM processes
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(running)
FROM processes
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(sleeping)
FROM processes
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(total)
FROM processes
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT mean(total_threads)
FROM processes
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean(context_switches), 1s)
FROM kernel
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /$host$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean(reads), 1s)
FROM diskio
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean(writes), 1s)
FROM diskio
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/  AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean(read_bytes), 1s)
FROM diskio
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean(write_bytes), 1s)
FROM diskio
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean(read_time), 1s)
FROM diskio
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean(write_time), 1s)
FROM diskio
WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/
GROUP BY time($aggregation)
fill(null)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$host/
